id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of Pattern if (Positive/Negative tests). Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select v pattern ifs(v, _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS invalid synonym MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; assign a; Select ifs pattern ifs(a, _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS Ident MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("red", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS invalid Ident MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("nonexist", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS wildcard MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs(_, _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS Integer MID wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs(1, _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; stmt s; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, s, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID wildcard RHS synonym

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; prog_line n; Select v pattern ifs(v, _, n)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v, v1; constant c; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, v1, c)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID Ident RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select v pattern ifs(v, "q", _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID wildcard RHS Ident

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, _, "fact")

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID Ident RHS Ident

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, "red", "wrong")

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID Integer RHS wildcard

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select v pattern ifs(v, 20, _)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID wildcard RHS Integer

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, _, 31)

id.comment: Pattern if syntax, LHS synonym MID Integer RHS Integer

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, 1, 24)

id.comment: Set 2 - Pattern if at different nesting levels (Algorithmic Tests). Pattern if nesting, Not nested 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("x", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Not nested 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("sky", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Nested in if 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("yellow", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Nested in if 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("left", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Nested in while 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("one1", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Nested in while 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("fact", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Multiple nested 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("fiction", _, _)

id.comment: Pattern if nesting, Multiple nested 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("right", _, _)

id.comment: Set 3 - Relation tests for Pattern if (Algorithmic Tests). Relation, Select all if that has variable in condition

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern ifs(v, _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all variable that is in if condition

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select v pattern ifs(v, _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all if that has a specific variable in condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("y", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all if that has a specific variable in condition 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("red", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Select all if that has a specific variable in condition 3

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("fact", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if condition but not while 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("blue", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if condition but not while 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("right", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in while condition but not if 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("pear", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, variable that is in while condition but not if 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("rain", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if and while condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("x", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is in if and while condition 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("yellow", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not in if or while condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("q", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not in if or while condition 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("t", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not nested and not in if condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("out", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is not nested and not in if condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("end", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is nested but not in if condition 1

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("i", _, _)

id.comment: Relation, Variable that is nested but not in if condition 2

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("black", _, _)

id.comment: Set 4 - Boundary tests for Pattern if (Boundary tests). Boundary, Non-existent variable

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs pattern ifs("oasis", _, _)
